entry.title: Wednesday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain at times heavy this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 2:23 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 2:23 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
